IONIAN SEA.
ITALY TO GREECE.
DNC 09.
1. TEN METER S/V TARTIFLETTE 2, WHITE HULL,
   ONE PERSON ON BOARD, UNREPORTED TROPEA
   (38-40-33N 015-53-43E) TO
   KALAMATA (37-02-15N 022-06-41E). LAST KNOWN
   POSITION IN VICINITY 37-00-00N 020-00-00E.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
   MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
   FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT OR JRCC PIRAEUS,
   TELEX: 601211588, 601211254,
   PHONE: 3021 0411 2500, 3021 0422 0772,
   FAX: 3021 0413 2398, 3021 0411 5798.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1851/17.
